title: Emerald and Diamond Raashi Necklace
materials: 22K Gold. Round cut and Pear cut Emeralds of high clarity. Brilliant cut Diamonds
VS clarity. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: The necklace features a contemporary design with evenly spaced emeralds and floral diamond clusters along the chain. The pendant has a traditional paisley motif at the top that flows into a pear shaped emerald surrounded by a field of small diamonds and the pendant features round gold beads that gently sway with every movement. It also has a unique design with a braided gold strands that adds to the necklace's appeal. The diamond setting is meticulously crafted for maximum sparkle. The piece blends modern sensibilities with traditional South Indian aesthetics.
colors: and white (diamonds). The emeralds provide a refreshing contrast against the brilliance of the diamonds and the warmth of the gold.
occasions: or evening events. Also suitable as bridal wear for reception or sangeet
adding a touch of contemporary elegance to traditional attire.
description: This necklace is a symbol of refined taste, blending the timeless allure of emeralds and diamonds with modern design. The high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensure durability and lasting beauty. Its design makes it a modern heirloom to be cherished for generations.
